entry.title: Toy Post
entry.content: This post is for adjusting my blog theme and presenting some fantastic features of NexT. Code Block1. Let’s try some code! 12import numpy as npimport matplotlib.pyplot as plt Note2. Let’s try some note blocks! This is default note without any style. This is “default” note. This is “primary” note. This is “info” note. This is “success” note. This is “warning” note. This is “danger” note. This is “danger” note without icon. Just use note xxxx no-icon to trigger this style. These note blocks are actually built-in features for the latest NexT v7. However, as I uses NexT v5.1.4 as the basic theme, I manually added correponding codes to my custom.styl.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: This post marked the birth of each blog built with Hexo! Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
